title: 9 "My Buddha"Transliteration: "Watashi no Hotoke-sama" (Japanese:わたしの仏様) Arifumi Imai Dai Hashiyama Arifumi Imai August 31, 2024(2024-08-31)
transformers_text: 9 My Buddha Transliteration Wat a shi no Hot oke sama Japanese Arif umi Imai Dai Hashi yama Arif umi Imai August 31 2024 2024 08 31 Despite his injury Sh kan keeps attacking Toki yuki to no avail and collapses from blood loss while the other Elusive Warriors kill Sh kan's lieutenants S adam une arrives with reinforcements and attempts to claim the village but is forced to retreat when Ge nba arrives bringing Yo rishi ge and the Suwa's main force with him S adam une rescues a critically wounded Sh kan and recognizing his worth awards him with an official title and lands while forbidding his group from committing more crimes in preparation for the imminent war against the Suwa After the battle Fub uki learns about Toki yuki's real identity and is officially welcomed into the Elusive Warriors
